cc:Work.dc:title: 7-segments indicator. Play with buttons
cc:Work.dc:description: Download and play with buttons. I was studying SVG DOM and this counter was my study tool.\n\nSorry for misspell in the code. Replace "brake" with "break" everywhere it appears in the "switch" procedure or use Tom's remix to avoid annoying error alerts in IE+Renesis. I have my own version of similar to Tom's code, but do not want to spam OpenClipart.org
